settings.image_blog_subtitle: This is a subheading for your blog page

settings.content: You wake up every day dreading looking in the mirror. Embarrassed by what others think of your skin, you slather on the thickest foundation you can find hoping no one will notice your breakouts.  Some days are worse than others, you’ve skipped out on social events with friends and have even called in sick to work because it was just that bad.

settings.page_quote: You've Tried Everything, and I mean everything under the sun

You google “Tips on how to clear up your skin” but realize this is where the real headache starts. You read multiple websites sharing top ten lists to clear up your skin. Each article has similar information and conflicting thoughts.

settings.content: After scouring websites for advice, you are left confused as to what to do next.

settings.subtitle: You think about all the time, money, and effort spent trying to fix your problem.

settings.page_quote: You throw your hands up and say "Screw it; I don’t care."

settings.content:
You give yourself a pep talk in front of the mirror on how you don’t have to have good skin, and it doesn’t make you who you are.

24 hours pass and you realize you can’t give up on yourself like that and now you’re sucked back into the vortex of searching, hoping, digging, looking for results again. You come across an article talking about how hormones and internal factors affect breakouts and then you have an AH HA moment.

YOU’VE BEEN TREATING THE PROBLEM WRONG!

settings.title: YOU THEN TRY A NEW APPROACH:
settings.content:
● You visit a hormone doctor

● You visit a naturopath

● You follow a clean diet

● You try every vitamin supplement

● You went vegan (until your husband found out you served him a tofu turkey for dinner)

settings.page_quote: You implemented all the suggestions, excited you finally figured it out, only to wake up day after day,walking over to the mirror and still seeing little to no difference than before.

settings.title: Hi, I'm Camille, founder of Averr Aglow
Have I covered it all?
settings.text:
Have you nodded along saying "Yep, been there, done that?"

How do I know this?

You see… I’ve been there too. I battled with breakouts for over 16 years.

I’ve ben through every single thing mentioned above and still had the worst skin of my life.

And only when I lost my confidence, I decided to take matter into my own hands and create my own all-natural skincare products that ACTUALLY work.

settings.title: Get The Clear skin Kit NOW
settings.text:
Ready to stop burning through products and see results? Finally smile and feel confident when you look in the mirror! 

Achieve Breakout-FREE skin with a formula consisting of over 40 vitamins and minerals that will:

☯Balance the oil production on your skin

⛔Eliminate the bad bacteria which cause breakouts while promoting the good bacteria

🥌Help remove dead, unwanted skin

🥑Nurture the skin with nutrients it needs to be healthy, glowing & clear.

In 4 years, this formula has helped over 20.073+ women. Will you be the next one?

settings.title: Not Convinced Yet? Check Out my Clear Skin Guide
settings.content: There are 4 main reasons why nothing has worked for you before. Read my clear skin guide to discover them all!

settings.page_quote: Real Customers, Real Results from Averr Aglow Users

settings.title: Chloe
settings.text:
"I am just the average person who tried everything and nothing worked (since age 12, now 31). I saw this as an ad and thought just another product that's costly and overrated....but it's not! I had the courage to try it, and I am a forever user of Averr Aglow! It has changed my everyday life.

My skin is by no means perfect...yet, but I wanted to share my story even though I'm usually not the type to put it all out there like this. Here is my before and after! This is years of pain and suffering during my adult life because of acne, along with my skin as of yesterday! What a difference 2 months makes, and how great these products feel.

My skin is nourished and not dry or oily and that is the best feeling! Thanks Averr Aglow and I hope this gives some of you hope or the courage to try it!"

settings.title: Mindy J
settings.text:
33, Gering NE

I've been using the Clear Skin Kit for about six months. 

I have had acne since my teens, everything I had tried never really worked. Over the last few years I have had cystic and hormonal acne and had a hard time getting it under control. So, I decided to start using Rodan and Fields. I did 2 rounds of their unblemish regimen and it didn’t help at all. Then, I came across AverrAglow and decided to give it a try. I’m so glad I did. It has cleared up all my acne and I haven’t had any major breakouts like I had been having, and has helped all my scars lessen.

My before pictures are AFTER the 2 rounds of R&F in January and my after pictures were taken in June after using the Clear Skin Kit.

settings.title: Melissa D
settings.text:
Aliquippa PA

I have been using the kit since early July and I am loving the results! Out of nowhere in January of this year I started having the worst acne ever. Saw an ad on Instagram just one month before my wedding and decided to go for it. While I wasn't 100% clear for the big day, I was in no more pain and the redness was now something I could correct.

It wasn't until just the last few weeks I looked in the mirror realizing that my troubles seem to be fading away! I will still have one or two baby zits now and then but wow! So 3.5 ish months in i am so happy I saw that ad! Thank you for an amazing product!

settings.title: Abby
settings.text:
"I've struggled with acne since I was 12 years old and have tried everything under the sun (you know how it goes) and I just can't say enough good things about the Averr Aglow skincare line.

Most importantly that it's actually an all-natural regimen. I don't even have to use our gross city water to cleanse my face. It's great."

settings.title: Holli S
settings.text:
24, Austin TX

I've been using AverrAglow for a couple months now, and I have been floored by the results. I've searched for something - anything that works for my skin. All I've wanted is go without makeup and feel comfortable in my skin. I've tried everything and it's failed. All natural products are also of utmost importance and all the natural products I've tried have failed as well.

I've shown everyone I know these pictures and told them all about AverrAglow. People ask me all the time what I'm using and I gladly tell them. My best friend also hopped on board and is loving her results so far.

settings.title: Adele
settings.text:
"From the beginning of my teens to now 36, I have struggled with some form of acne. The fortune spent on high-end products, low ends products, home remedies, doctor appointments/treatments.....26+ years so much wasted time and money. Teen acne, hormonal acne, cystic acne...what have you.

This past June I was fortunate enough to stumble upon the Averr Aglow FB ad.....honestly didn't think it would help me but I had nothing left to lose and extra money in the budget so I purchased the clear skin kit with hesitation and doubt.

My current bout of acne were large cysts on my jawline, under the jaw, and down the neck, they were painful and embarrassing. The picture on the right is when I started in June (excuse my angle but it was the only way to see it all at once under the jaw and down the neck). The left is this week ♥️ I went through the purge like everyone else for a good 2 plus months which basically just stayed like the right picture plus a few more cyst clusters. I just kept going.

I didn't want to feel defeated again so I just kept going, stayed hopeful and boy, I'm so happy I did because there is a light at the end of the tunnel! I have not had a cyst come back since the beginning of September! Even during those times of the month and not changing my diet one bit. I still have texture issues due to the years of acne and scarring...

But every day gets better and better and I just want to thank you Averr Aglow for finally ending my struggle with acne and making it possible to walk outside without makeup on!"

settings.title: Crystal M
settings.text:
28, Lancaster PA

I've had been struggling with cystic acne, oily skin, and enlarged pores for about 15 years. I've been to the dermatologist and have been prescribed clindamycin for a couple years. I've tried Proactiv, Murad, retinol, benzoyl peroxide, and so many products with salicylic acid. Everything I have used has had many artificial processed ingredients.

When I looked into AverrAglow it was so refreshing to see a company actually using all natural ingredients, I had to try it out. I ended up getting the Clear Skin Kit & within the first week my skin felt renewed. My pores were smaller, I didn't need to exfoliate as often and my acne had pretty much disappeared. I have been using the kit for 6 months & will continue to use it for the rest of my life, I love that it's good for anti-aging as well. Nothing harsh or artificial, so I feel like it gives me the skin I was supposed to have.

settings.title: Emily
settings.text:
"Almost one month apart. In the worse picture, I hadn’t used Averr Aglow yet. That was the worst my skin had been in years (thanks, stress, and hormones from planning my wedding). Products alone won’t fix your acne, if you’re hoping this will cure you, you are wrong. You need to change your diet and maybe even get your hormones checked but a product alone won’t cure you. I’ve worked with my esthetician for ￼years and she’s told me this soooo many times.

Acne takes at least 30-60 maybe even more days to come to head because of the way your skin regenerates. So to the people breaking out and purging, that acne was there already, it’s just releasing itself.

This all takes time. If you expect results right away and keep swapping products you’re going to be sorely disappointed. If you think this is too expensive, the pain of having acne is worse. Don’t hop around to cheap drugstore products just because they are easy and convenient. Prioritize. Your face should be worth it. Especially if you are like me and want to feel confident in your own skin. You can’t wash your face once and expect it to be clear just like you can’t work out once and expect to be in shape.

September 18th and October 13th. Trust the process. Everything takes time."

settings.title: Lyndsay B
settings.text:
St. John MI

I have very oily skin that easily clogs. It has been a long road finding something that doesn't dry me out or scar my skin. I've tried every product under the sun and avoided taking pictures.

I started to use the Clear Skin Kit, and now I no longer breakout and get the painful, deep red cysts I used to get. Thank you from the bottom of my heart. I am a loyal customer!

settings.title: Ready for Clear Skin?
settings.text: Tired of looking in the mirror dreading what you see? Become our next Before & After and feel confident in your skin.

settings.title: Katie S
settings.text:
Eau Claire WI

I started struggling with acne in college. After trying every grocery store 'cheap' option I finally ordered Proactiv and found it worked well. As I got older I wanted to stop using it, I was becoming aware of just how many chemicals and ingredients were in it. While it helped with my acne, my overall skin was often extremely dry. I was desperate for products that not only helped my acne, but was also good for my skin. But it had become a sort of crutch, I thought for sure if I stopped using it my face would break out.

In 2016 I became pregnant with baby boy #2! I again quit using Proactiv, but this pregnancy I unfortunately had awful skin, particularly on my chin. Then one day last December, I came across a AverrAglow ad on Instagram. I clicked on it, was very intrigued.

I ordered the kit and used it as directed. Within a week I realized I had no new pimples. I took a before photo then, because I knew I would want to see how it worked for me. Within a month I had not had one new pimple and the acne I did have had cleared up.

settings.title: Kelsie R
settings.text:
24, Goldendale WA

I've used the Clear Skin Kit about 4 weeks. I have been struggling with acne since I was 14 years old. I've always had small breakout here and there, but when I got older I started getting really bad acne everywhere.

I've seen dermatologist after dermatologist. I've tried basically every over the counter acne medication you could think of and of course, nothing has worked. I have very sensitive skin, so everything that has been given to me dried my face out to the point it almost made it worse. Then someone told me it sounds weird but oil fights oil. It sounded crazy to me, but then I started researching and came upon AverrAglow. I was very skeptical, but figured why not try it; I've tried everything else. I was so excited to try it and love my results so far!

settings.title: Lyndsey G
settings.text:
30, Annapolis, MD

I have had difficult skin since teen years.  I had been using Proactiv for ten years and my skin was dull, still had breakouts and I knew there had to be a better system that did not dry my skin or that was full of chemicals.  

I then went on a year quest to find a perfect natural system and tried countless methods, the ACV method, the no wash method (caveman), the oil only method, plain soap, various other natural lines and was breaking out worse than ever.  I saw an add on Facebook for Averr Aglow and assumed it was bogus because it was on Facebook; but as I was desperate so I looked anyway.  Turned out the ingredients were AMAZING and no chemicals.  I figured why not and haven't looked back.

settings.title: Lara C
settings.text:
30, Delray Beach, FL

I have been using AverrAglow since March. Prior to this I used a lot of dermatologist prescribed acne medications including antibiotics and retinol based creams.

Approaching 30 years old for me was a complete disappointment. My face took a toll on me and coming from a person who never had cystic acne, I was devastated. So, like most women I immediately booked an appointment with a dermatologist and also an esthetician for a facial, for 7 months I followed all instructions from both professionals with no results. I was having to wear a lot of makeup just to cover my face. My confidence level was so low, that I no longer wanted to be social with people.

Until one day I couldn't sleep and decided to surf my Facebook account and came across an article featuring all that AverrAglow had to offer. At first I was very skeptical, (having tried so many products) but then I thought to myself, what do I have to lose? What the heck! I already had spent lots of money on professional help and nothing worked, so this products were my last attempt at beautiful skin! And let's just say that for the record, I have never made a better choice when it comes to my skin. Thank you for the invention of AverrAglow. This experience has truly been a remarkable investment.

settings.title: Julie S
settings.text:
44, Langhorne, PA

I am currently 44 and have suffered from acne for over 20 years. There were times when it was not that bad, but there were also times when it was unbearable and I would call out from work and avoid social situations because I was ashamed of how my skin looked. I can't even imagine the thousands of dollars I have spent trying to find a way to fix my skin, but I never found a long term solution. I do not have cystic type acne, but the type that I now understand is hormonal acne that causes breakouts, plus I have had a very bad problem with clogged pores and contact dermatitis.

I suffered through a miserable summer before stumbling on a way to heal my skin that following fall I first came across the Averr Aglow. The packaging was so gorgeous that I had to try it. I try to only use green beauty, and I was impressed with the ingredients I used the Clear Skin Kit. I first contacted customer service, and every experience I have had with them has been beyond helpful. Their customer service truly is first rate.

Three days into using the Clear Skin Kit, I could tell that it was working. How? Well, my skin started FEELING different. It started feeling more like the skin on my body, which in general has never been prone to breakouts. I had a few VERY tiny little pores that seemed to be unclogging during the first week, but since the day I started using Averr Aglow I have not had one new blemish pop up. I love every piece in the four part system, but my favorite is the mask. When I first started using it I appreciated being able to “hide” my breakouts - out of sight, out of mind. Now I enjoy using it because my skin is so clear and vibrant when I remove it in the morning. The cleanser truly removes any trace of makeup from my skin, the spray is so refreshing and smells amazing, and the moisturizer is a dream under mineral makeup.

settings.title: Juli C
settings.text: I have been using the products for little over a month. I can't believe I am seeing flatter, clearer skin! Thank-you so much for giving me my confidence back!

settings.title: How About You?
settings.text: Are you tired of looking in the mirror seeing no results? Try our Clear Skin Kit so you can finally see clear skin and the results you have been looking for!

settings.content: You’ve been through enough, it’s finally time to feed your skin what it’s been craving!

And you’ll be doing just that with Averr Aglow’s products. You’ll be providing it with:

Essential nutrients found in every ingredient we used to make our natural blends. Blends rich in antioxidants, vitamins, minerals, and omegas. All things that don’t sensitize your skin.

Plant-powered skin care that has no numbers or abbreviations in its ingredients list. Nothing we make has been cooked up by a bunch of chemists.

Also, you can rest assured no poor animal is being slathered with our products. The two words we take very seriously - cruelty-free.

Much needed help to balance the natural pH of your skin. Our products help you remove dead skin cells, kill acne-causing bacteria, heal, detox and get closer to the smooth, glowing complexion you’ve been desiring.

Stay in the loop with what new products, helpful articles and videos we have in store for you…...

by liking our Facebook Page Here

This wonderful product is the crucial FIRST STEP in your daily skincare routine.

The special blend of organic rose water, cucumber, and fennel seed extract reduces redness and oiliness and softens the skin.

But more importantly, it primes it to soak up all the healthy nutrients from the rest of the products in Averr Aglow’s Clear Skin Kit.

How to apply:
1. Close your eyes.

2. Spray generously until your whole face is covered with this beautiful mist. About 10 sprays will be enough.

Also, it’s ideal for use after the gym.

Remember, due to the delicate nature of its formulation (natural ingredients), this product’s color may vary from batch to batch and may fade in the light.

It’s possible, that your Radiant Cleansing Nectar won’t have a consistent color upon delivery.

That’s because the more dense ingredients in it (manuka, jojoba) would’ve gone to the top of the bottle. This happens ONLY with plant-based products and it’s natural (even good).

For best results:


1. Prime your face for cleaning by spraying it with the Clarifying Hydration Dew.
2. Shake up the Radiant Cleansing Nectar until it’s an even shade.
3. Open the bottle and turn upside down on a cotton pad. (do NOT use a cotton ball). Hold in place until the cleanser soaks through to the bottom of the cotton. One side will be oily looking, while the other should look more watery.
4. Take the more oily side and fully buff the face and neck, if desired, and then repeat the process with the more watery side.

IMPORTANT: There’s no need to rinse the cleanser off.


The cotton pad traps the dirt, bacteria, and oil on the skin and provides it with nutrients that help heal and clear breakouts.

Called by Good Day Philadelphia, “The FIRST overnight clay mask that helps dry acne while you sleep,” this revolutionary product doesn’t only help with healing breakouts…

...it actually prevents them from ever forming!

We used actual French pink clay when making it. Lesser products say they do that, but instead mix regular clay with artificial colors or red clay to get the same look.

The Clear Skin Elixir is amazing at:

- Helping your skin stabilize oil production (prevent that excess shine)

- Helps you get rid of those pesky, little, white bumps

- Has an aromatherapy value thanks to such ingredients as chamomile, bergamot, and tea tree oil.

How to get the best results:

Best to be used at night before going to bed!

1. Spray your face with the Clarifying Hydration Dew.
2. Exfoliate/clean your skin with the Radiant Cleansing Nectar and a cotton pad.

*Tip: If you want, you can apply your Averr Aglow Flawless Nourishment Cream before the next step.

3. Apply the Clear Skin Elixir to your face and neck in small circular movements about 10 minutes before going to bed.

No worries, it stays intact throughout the evening and it won’t rub off on your pillow.

The perfect daily moisturizer that keeps your skin hydrated from morning till night.

Jam-packed with over 19 ingredients rich in Zinc, Vitamin A, C, D, E, and Omega 3, 6, 9 - specially blended to help your skin’s natural ability to restore and heal itself.

How to get the best results:

Best to be used in the morning to ensure your skin is moisturized throughout the whole day!

1. Spray your face with the Clarifying Hydration Dew.
2. Exfoliate/clean your skin with the Radiant Cleansing Nectar and a cotton pad.
3. Gently stir the Flawless Nourishment Cream with the included spatula, if there’s some separation (which is good!)
4. Take included spatula and remove a pea to half a pea sized amount from jar.
- Unlike most skincare companies we don’t dilute our products, so your cream is very concentrated, has NO water and NO chemical emulsifiers in it.
5. Dab between fingers and apply evenly to both cheeks, forehead, and chin.

Due to the delicate nature of this formulation, the cream may liquefy in transit during the warmer months. This is normal and does not affect the efficacy of the product. If this occurs, simply place the jar in the fridge for 24-48 hours to restore it to its creamy texture.

Also, the natural color of our cream is due to the oils we use, so color can vary from batch to batch.

If you have mixed feelings about toners in general…

...and you hate the tight feeling you’re left with from other brands…

You’ll love our Luminous Complexion Toner!

Rich in antioxidants, allantoin, and Vitamin C…

It delivers a special blend of 16 botanic ingredients designed to help reduce blackheads, tighten pores, reduce fine lines, balance oily/dry skin and prevent scars.

How to get the best results quicker:

Best to be applied in the morning after cleaning your skin and before moisturizing.

1. Clean your skin. (For best results spray first with the Clarifying Hydration Dew, then exfoliate with the Radiant Cleansing Nectar)
2. Apply gently the Luminous Complexion Toner to your face and neck, if needed.

- Do NOT rinse off, after applying it.
3. Moisturize. (For best results use our Flawless Nourishment Cream)

Amazing product that helps with refining fine lines, preventing wrinkle formation, removing dark under-eye circles and evens out hyperpigmentation, thanks to its nutrient rich, cold pressed, organic, botanical oils.

Why is it so special?

Because, it contains:

-Prickly Pear Oil - Which has the highest amount of Vitamin E in ANY plant oil (higher even than Argan Oil). Lowers skin’s water loss and increases its moisture.

-Passion Fruit Oil - Rich in Vitamin A, which is vital for your skin’s healing abilities. It also helps with reducing swelling and irritation.

-Acai Oil - An antioxidant powerhouse. It helps your skin restore its elasticity levels while being anti-bacterial.

How to get the most out of your serum:

Of course, for best results you need to use it at night after cleansing your face and before going to bed.

1. Clean your skin. (For best results spray first with the Clarifying Hydration Dew, then exfoliate with the Radiant Cleansing Nectar)
2. Apply 3-4 drops of the serum into the palm of your hand and press firmly into the face, jaw, and neck.

*Tip: It can be used alone, but for synergistic combo it’s best if you apply next the Clear Skin Elixir.

settings.title: Volcanic ash from France? Really?!
settings.content:
As I said before, that’s the main ingredient of the pink clay used in our Clear Skin Elixir.

Now relax, we’re not risking our lives by running around French volcanoes, everytime they erupt, just to collect some ash for you…

Although, we’d do it if it meant you having the skin you’re dreaming of.

What we actually do is, we import...

settings.title: The highest quality pink clay right from France.

settings.content:
Called by many experts, “the most gentle of all the clays”, pink clay is perfect for sensitive and irritable skin types.

Rich in minerals, it helps to improve cell renewal and skin elasticity.

Also, because of its negative ion charge, it actually pulls the toxins out of the skin giving it a more refined look.

Many skincare brands claim they use this amazing pink clay, but what they do instead is mix white and red clays. Or even worse, some add artificial colors to white clay so it looks pink.

The genuine product can be found in a very few places around the world, like France and Australia. That’s why we order just enough to produce only small batches of our Clear Skin Elixir.

That’s not the only thing I talk about in this short “Ingredient Spotlight” video.

I firmly believe…

You need to know what goes into your skincare products!

So, here are some more natural ingredients found in Averr Aglow’s products:

Raspberry Seed Oil - building block of our Flawless Nourishment Cream and our Clear Skin Elixir, this cold-pressed oil has a natural SPF (protects your skin from the sun), helps it retain more water so it’s hydrated throughout the day, and helps it heal wounds and breakouts faster.

Prickly Pear Seed Oil - used in our Perfectionist Overnight Serum and sourced straight from Morocco, this natural oil is filthy rich in Vitamin E. Even richer than Argan oil, widely regarded as the best source of the vitamin. Its magic is that it helps the skin reduce inflammation.

The truth is we use 60+ plant and mineral based ingredients when making the Averr Aglow products.

It’ll take me much longer to list all the amazing benefits they deliver.

So for starters, check the short Ingredient Spotlight video and learn how we use nature’s gifts to nourish your skin.

I hope you enjoy it!

settings.questionText: How long will it take to see results?
settings.answerText: Each person's results will be different based on lifestyle habits and previous product choices. Some of our users see results in the first night and others take a few months before they see any improvement. It is based on your unique skin and what is going on below the surface of your skin. Some users start to clear up immediately and others will breakout first and then clear up. Unfortunately, this is the nature of a breakout and with the introduction of the these products, this is possible. They contain a lot of active ingredients that help speed up the healing and detoxing of the skin. Hang in there, they are working to help your skin.

settings.questionText: How long does each product last?
settings.answerText:
1 Clarifying Hydration Dew 45-60 Days (1.5 - 2 months)

2 Radient Cleansing Nectar 30-45 Days (1.5 months)

3 Clear Skin Elixir 75-90 days (2- 3 months)

4 Flawless Nourishment Cream 60-90 Days (2 - 3 months)

T Luminous Complexion Toner (2-3 months)

S Perfectionist Serum (2-3 months)

settings.questionText: Will these products dry my skin out?
settings.answerText:
Perhaps you have tried dozens of products that have made you tight, dry, and irritated. Our products are unlike anything you may have tried and will not dry you out, make you red, or cause your skin to peel. They contain a lot of moisturizing extracts and oils that will not clog your pores but help you achieve a beautiful, glowing complexion.

If you have dry skin and breakouts we recommend the Clear Skin Kit because each of the products will heal breakouts but also keep skin balanced and moisturized. If you use the Clear Skin Elixir by itself, make sure to not use an overly drying cleanser.

settings.questionText: What grade of ingredients do you use?
settings.answerText:
We use the highest grade of cosmetic ingredients available to us. We source organic and wildcrafted ingredients from exotic locations that specialize and deliver the most luxurious of ingredients and with the highest amount of nutrients for that plant from that particular location. Plants can vary in nutrition where they are pulled, so we source oils and extracts that have the highest nutritional value based on the region. We also are meticulous in how our ingredients are extracted and avoid ingredients that are chemically extracted despite being plant-based.

Plant Oils - never chemically extracted, we use first pressing, cold pressed fresh plant oils direct from farmers who have a passion for their craft.

Essential Oils - We use steam distilled and the highest quality available with the most potent compounds in ideal, safe ratios. Many of our essential oils are organic or wildcrafted.

Clays- free from heavy metals, our clays are rich in minerals and free from harmful substances.

settings.questionText: Are your products good for ROSACEA?
settings.answerText: Yes, we have had many customers use our products for rosacea because they contain a lot of extracts that help with redness, swelling, pimples, and inflammation. The ingredients we use and chose are excellent for sensitive skin and are highly nutritious to inflamed skin. The ingredients boost the immune system in the skin and work to help heal and restore symptoms of rosacea.

settings.questionText: I have cystic acne. Will this work for me?
settings.answerText:
Yes, our products will help cystic acne, but there are a few things we want you to be aware of to help you achieve the best skin possible. We recommend the use of the Clear Skin Kit over the individual products. They work together to help cystic and inflamed acne.

Cystic Acne is the most advanced case of breakouts. There is a lot of inflammation under the skin and buildup. Some see results in the first week and, others can take between 30-60 days to see results. If you need the process to work faster, we recommend a facial with extractions for quick results especially if you have a wedding or big event coming up.

After a facial, follow the nighttime and daytime routine as included in the kit immediately that day of the facial for best results.

Also, during this first 30-60 days, limit the consumption of sugar, dairy, and fast food, to give your skin a chance to heal and detox.

settings.questionText: Are your products for sensitive skin?
settings.answerText:
Our products are designed for sensitive skin. They are hypoallergenic, non-irritating, and paraben free. We source organic and wildcrafted ingredients from exotic locations that specialize and deliver the most luxurious of ingredients and with the highest amount of nutrients for that plant from that particular location.

Examples include:

- Pink Clay from France

- Roman Chamomile from England

- Raspberry Seed Oil from Washington State

- Manuka from New Zealand

- Bergamot from Italy

- Coral from sustainably harvested above sea level beds in the Caribbean

Our products do not contain harsh chemicals, toxins, and fillers like many other beauty products. They are vegan and cruelty-free.

settings.tab_content_1: Born from the frustration of skincare products that just won’t work and breakouts that just won’t fight, this system contains four powerhouse products that use gentle aggression to fight your current breakouts and prevent new ones from forming. Filled with over 40 all-natural ingredients, each product is carefully designed to help kill harmful bacteria while replenishing the skin with essential nutrients. This kit addresses each aspect of skin health from cleansing and hydration to detoxifying and balancing. By using the right combination of natural ingredients the Clear Skin Kit helps your skin function properly while avoiding pesky breakouts, congestion, and inflammation altogether.
settings.tab_content_2:
Light + Refreshing
From your first application of each step in the Clear Skin Kit, your skin will feel clean, refreshed, and healthy. We don’t use harsh ingredients that cause uncomfortable side effects or thick creams that leave your skin feeling heavy.

No-Rinse Formula
Our #2 Radiant Cleansing Nectar is rinse free! That means when you’re done applying, you can just move on to the next step. Unlike typical foaming cleansers, our Radiant Cleansing Nectar is created with essential oils and other natural ingredients that are expertly combined to comfortably stay on your skin and provide lasting nourishment.

Smooth + Supple
Healthy skin is in your reach. With regular application of our combination of natural ingredients, you can look forward to a smooth complexion with just the right amount of hydration.

Acne Purge
Our products are full of botanicals rich in minerals that help extract bacteria and impurities from the skin. You might notice that you have an increase in breakouts shortly after beginning our skincare routine. This is just your skin purging the congestion that is backed up in your pores to make way for a clear complexion. Not everyone has an acne purge, but it’s a sign that your skin is getting rid of the bad and absorbing the good.

settings.advert_headline: I’m Depressed and My Adult Acne is to Blame

settings.advert_text: I started to get breakouts when I was 13, which is pretty typical for the start of puberty. I tried everything to clear my acne.
I tried steaming my face with a hot towel. I tried every over the counter spot treatment that my measly allowance could afford.

Having a clear complexion, even at the tender age of 13, was more important to me than buying a new computer game, pair of shoes, or lipgloss. I wanted to get rid of my unsightly pimples more than anything.
At 29, the feeling has not changed.

settings.advert_headline: Adult Acne Is On the Rise

settings.advert_text: Apparently I’m not alone.

In 2012, the American Academy of Dermatology published data on acne sufferers in the U.S. They found that more than 50% of women between the ages of 20 and 29 deal with acne. 25% of women between the ages of 40 and 49 do too!
And the numbers continue to grow.
When I was in college, a very cute boy asked me on a date.We went out to dinner and as a broke college kid who wasn’t paying, I splurged and ordered a soda.
The server barely left the table before my date looked at me and said, “You know, if you stop drinking soda, your acne will clear up.”
I was mortified. I tried to keep up appearances throughout dinner but I ended the night crying into my pillow.
I stopped dating for a while after that. My social life was ruled by my acne and I was depressed.

One study looked at the effects acne has on a person’s quality of life. It concluded that not only does acne contribute to psychological trauma like depression and anxiety, it also creates other issues like, self esteem problems, social isolation, and body dissatisfaction.

Many women, myself included, want to feel in control of our lives. We’re high functioning with jobs, children, and a slew of responsibilities. When a problem arises, we’re the ones who people turn to for a solution. Not in the case of acne though, and it’s leaving us defeated.
Getting society to change their views on acne is even harder. But you don’t have to start a hashtag-free-the-pimple campaign to make a difference, because someone else already did.
Louise Northcote, Britain's Next Top Model finalist started the movement to open up a community of people who could share their acne trials and triumphs while normalizing breakouts.
Other celebrities, like Katy Perry, Zendaya, and Kate Bosworth, have jumped on the bandwagon to tell their acne stories and send the message: ‘It’s normal, we all deal with it, no shame.’

settings.advert_headline: 4 Foods To Avoid If You Still Have Adult Acne

settings.advert_text: “Beauty comes from within” - unfortunately, so do breakouts. No matter what kind of diet you’re on, and no matter how long you’ve been on it - as soon as you get off track - breakouts come out immediately.
I know I know, you’ve already read many articles saying you not to eat that or that.

But after battling hormonal acne for almost 16 years and clearing it up, I discovered 1 important thing:
You only need to get 60-80% of your diet right and leave the rest of 20-40% to your skincare routine to do the job, so you can enjoy the foods you love.
At the end of the day, what is life without a chocolate croissant?
In this article, I’m going to cover the top 4 foods to avoid if you want to see the results much quicker.
Default text

This wasn’t a big surprise for you, there is a ton of scientific research written on how dairy can affect your digestion system, stimulate the growth of insulin-growth factor IGF-1 & cause inflammations on your skin (among many other damaging things to your health it’s associated to).
These products can include ice cream, butter, yogurt cream, cheese, milk.
You can easily substitute it with: coconut milk, hazelnut milk, almond milk (my favorite), hemp milk, cashew milk.
Default text
It’s been on the headlines lately as the number one enemy of a healthy diet. But why?

Refined carbohydrates (or gluten-rich products) are high in sugar, hence when we consume it - our sugar levels go up, which makes our insulin levels go up to stabilize blood glucose levels in our bodies.
It also increases the production of the insulin growth factor IGF-1, which makes our cells grow and increases sebum production, which creates a perfect environment for bacteria to grow.
Substitute it with gluten-free pasta, sweet potatoes, whole grain bread, wild rice.
Default text
Oh, this one is a difficult one to take… As we all love our sweets! And to be honest… It’s too hard to resist them…
However, sugar is one of the biggest contributors to our breakouts. Why is it bad for us? Once again, it makes our insulin levels spike, and its
So what do you do?
This is what helped from my personal experience:
1. Getting rid of all of the sugars from my home, this makes it hard to have access to them when you crave them the most.

2. Because cravings last for a long time - have a dark chocolate bar at home (85% and higher). Dark chocolate can act as an anti-inflammatory tool, and increase your blood circulation, which will deliver more oxygen to your skin and make it glowy.
However, there are some recent studies showing that dark chocolate could be causing acne too, so my best advice is - keep testing with your own body.
Default text

Ok, alcohol is not a food… However, it’s one of the main reasons why you’re still breaking out. Alcohol dehydrates your skin, which causes your skin to produce more oils to protect it, which can cause breakouts or acne relatively quickly.
If you’re a cocktail lover, I have bad news for you. Drinks like mojitos, margaritas and other cocktails are full of sugar too….

All of the tips flying around online don’t help either… As most of them are misleading, to say the least…

Well, I’ve been in that place before, where I felt frustrated with all of the contradictory tips I was finding online…That’s why I researched these 4 major reasons why you’re still having breakouts and I’ll share with you my findings on how to overcome that.

settings.advert_headline: 1. Internal Body Machine That Controls The Way Your Face Looks

settings.advert_text: By far the biggest reason why you’re still breaking out is - internal. It can range from hormones to digestion reasons.

Skin is the largest organ. A little known fact is that your face absorbs what is applied to it, much in the same way that internal organs use nutrients from the food ingested.
So if you apply low-quality beauty products onto it, your face is absorbing the harmful chemicals and toxins that are in many mainstream skincare products.
When using good skincare that contains ingredients rich in vitamins, minerals, omegas, and other vital nutrients, your skin will respond brilliantly and help you achieve the awesome glow you desire!

settings.advert_headline: Is Acne One of The Signs  of Hormonal Imbalance?

settings.advert_text: You’ve probably heard of the phrase 'hormonal acne', but are hormones really to blame for your breakouts?

It’s likely! In fact, your acne could be one of the signs of hormonal imbalance! 

Hormones like to work in harmony, so if one is not functioning right, it’s likely that they’re all out of balance.
However, hormones are complex. So even if they’re not being influenced by stress levels, diet or beauty products, they also fluctuate naturally when it comes to the female menstrual cycle.
Default text

Hormones are essential chemicals that are sent around your body to deliver signals to your tissues and organs, affecting your metabolism, mood, growth, and development. When they’re out of whack, they can cause some unpleasant side effects.
Here are some of the signs of hormonal imbalance:

• Extreme mood swings
  • Fertility issues
  • Low libido
  • Headaches
  • Fatigue
  • Unexplained weight gain
  • Trouble sleeping
  • Irregular menstrual cycle
  • Hair loss
  • Excess Body Hair
  • Acne
Default text
You might be inadvertently causing your imbalanced hormones. Lifestyle factors like those listed below can actually affect your hormone levels.

Birth Control: Most birth control contains estrogen which suppresses hormones that cause excess sebum. For some people, it actually improves their acne but it can also make it worse. Or maybe coming off your birth control is to blame.

Stress: We all know stress is bad for us, but if you’re struggling to relax, your skin starts to suffer. The more we stress the more our body generates sebum-producing hormones, leading to clogged pores and breakouts.

Diet: Meeting global food demands means more pesticide sprayed crops, linked to hormone disruption. But it’s not just inorganic food that could be to blame for your hormonal imbalance. Dairy has been linked with acne by producing more DHT, the hormone linked to sebum production.
Default text

If you’re experiencing one or more of the hormonal imbalance signs the first step is to see a medical professional so it can be addressed. However, there are a few things you can do in the meantime to show your endocrine system some TLC and eliminate that acne along the way:

• Choose organic food where possible.
  • Cut out or limit your intake of dairy.
  • Practice mindfulness techniques to reduce your stress levels.
  • Swap to more ‘clean & green’ household & personal products.
  • Hormonal support through supplements ( Zinc Picolinate, Saw Palmetto, DIM, Vitex, Beta-Sitosterol, Maca Powder)
The truth is you don’t need harmful ingredients to treat acne. In fact, natural ingredients can prove just as, if not more, effective and better for you in the long run.

Our Luminous Clear Skin Kit is kind to your complexion and respects its natural state of balance. It effectively gets into pores and clears that excess sebum build-up while maintaining those essential skin oils that are so important for hydration. Plus, they are formulated without any known hormone disruptors!

It’s time to start listening to your body and keeping an eye on what your acne is trying to tell you. Adopt a clean & natural skincare regime and healthier lifestyle practices to ensure you’re paving the way for happy clear skin!
Default text
settings.advert_headline: How to Find the Best Skin Care Routine for Your Skin

settings.advert_text: Did you know that on average, people use a skincare line for 6 months before switching it up? Clearly, something is not working.

Even products that worked, in the beginning, might not go the distance for your skin. If you find yourself stuck with a vanity top full of products that don’t do what they’re supposed to, it’s time to reevaluate and find a routine that works for you.
With the number of products available that promise immediate success, it can be confusing to figure out what will work for you.

Instead of resigning yourself to randomly picking something in a bout of exasperation, or trusting the salesperson who works off commission, learn what your skincare needs to do to keep you healthy, and how to know which products will fit the bill.

settings.advert_headline: Focus on the Skin Care Trifecta

settings.advert_text: Before you can choose a skincare regimen, you need to know what you want it to do. With all the pretty labels, everything seems like a critical must-have. In actuality, there are only three main things that your skincare should focus on when you’re trying to clear acne, a trifecta, if you will.
Your products and routine should be 1) exfoliating dead skin cells, 2) balancing oil production, and 3) killing bad bacteria, primarily P. Acnes.
Default text

Your cleanser has to do more than just cleanse. Removing makeup is a must, and you want to get rid of the grime of the day, but what about the dead skin cells collecting on your face and the sebum build-up?
Your average heavy-duty cleanser uses harsh ingredients that might get your skin squeaky clean but also strips your skin of necessary bacteria and oils.
The Averr Aglow Radiant Cleansing Nectar is a multi-tasking miracle that cleanses and replenishes so your skin stays healthy.
Buff it on with a cotton round, and it gently exfoliates off the dead skin and bacteria, while leaving behind vital antioxidants, fatty acids, and vitamins that keep your skin healthy and thriving.
Default text

Original toners of yesteryear were filled to the brim with alcohol, meant to annihilate any trace of oil on your skin. But we’ve learned a thing or two since then, like skin needs some oil, so don’t get rid of it all please and thank you.

Our Luminous Complexion Toner gets the job done with antioxidants galore, and vitamin C like you wouldn’t believe. With regular application, you can expect to see skin cell stimulation that promotes a bright complexion and diminishes lines, marks, and scars.
Default text
settings.advert_headline: Find a Serum for Damage Control

settings.advert_text: Like toners, a serum isn’t a necessity, but it can do wonders for your complexion. Formulated with a high concentration of potent ingredients, a serum will deeply penetrate your skin and work to solve a specific skin concern.
Our Perfectionist Overnight Serum targets all your pain points: marks, breakouts, texture, lines, and radiance.
Default text
settings.advert_headline: Make Your Face Mask Work for You

settings.advert_text: There are unending options for face masks from $1 sheet masks to $60 luxury brand miracle potions. You want to find one that packs the most punch.

Averr Aglow has two face masks in their lineup.Clear Skin Elixir The is a nightly overnight face mask and spot treatment that delicately clears your existing breakouts while pulling other imperfections out of the skin to prevent new blemishes. It creates a barrier that makes sure your other skincare is penetrating your skin and does it’s best work at night when your skin is already healing and restoring itself.
The Illuminating Essence Exfoliating Face Mask takes your exfoliating game to the next level. Use it a few times a week to detox and brighten your skin.

Whether you’re oily, dry, or combo, you need a moisturizer. Hydration is paramount to a healthy complexion. Without enough hydration, your skin could have a whole host of regrettable results, like dryness, flakiness, deeper wrinkles, and inflammation.

Our gorgeous Flawless Nourishment Cream is the perfect step to help you achieve a flawless complexion. Not only does it provide the necessary amount of hydration, but it has ingredients like pumpkin seed and rosehip that heal and prevent breakouts. Talk about two birds with one stone!
Default text
If you follow the above advice, you’ll have a solid foundation for your skincare routine, but there are still beneficial additions that you can incorporate to nourish your face further.

Facial mists might seem like an unnecessary addition, but damp skin actually absorbs products faster than when it’s dry. It also encourages the ingredients to penetrate deeper, so your skin gets the full benefits.
We recommend using our facial mist, the Clarifying Hydration Dew, before you cleanse, moisturize, or apply your serum. In fact, we love it so much, we’ve included it in our Clear Skin Kit.
Another necessary extra is a makeup remover. Our Completely Clear Gelee Makeup Remover does the job in a flash without any unnecessary pulling and rubbing on your sensitive skin.

Other helpful products that your face will love you for:
  • Lip balm: your lips need hydration, just like your face, and no, licking them is not going to cut it.
  • Sunscreen: We love the sun and everything, but its harmful rays can wreak havoc on a perfect complexion. Slather on a good mineral-based sunscreen daily to stay safe and protected.
  • Spa treatments: We fully support a good facial. Facials help with a deep pore-clearing, not to mention they’re relaxing, and a lack of stress is good for your skin.
Default text
settings.advert_headline: Your Perfect Skin Care Routine is Waiting

settings.advert_text: You know what your skincare needs to clear your complexion and keep it nourished and healthy with essential vitamins and minerals. You could search the interwebs to find a regimen that fulfills the skincare trifecta and repeat the process of trying out pricey products only to find they don’t work. Or, you could get started with the Clear Skin Kit that has proven results and research-driven formulas.

We know what works because we’ve tried it. Your perfect skincare routine is just a click away. Concerned that your results aren’t coming fast enough? Read all about Acne Purging to know what to expect when you start a new, effective skincare line.
Default text
The cause of acne is pretty simple: dead skin cells, sebum, and bacteria goop together and clog your pores, causing an infection in the skin. Straight forward, right?
But why? Why your skin, why you? We have answers! Keep reading to learn where your breakouts are starting and what changes you can make to prevent them.
Default text

Acne thrives on inflammation . Your body resorts to inflammation to combat anything foreign or threatening. Scientists are still trying to figure out what triggers acne, but one educated guess is that it starts with stress.

Then you have to account for follicular hyperkeratinization, which is a fancy term for excessive skin cell growth. Folks prone to acne produce skin cells too fast for your body to keep up. They get sticky and stuck in your pores and, along with the inflammation, effectively narrow the pore opening.
The dead skin combines with sebum, which is probably also being produced in excess and creates the perfect environment for bacteria growth.

Most people already have bacteria, P. acnes, living on their skin, and don’t have a problem. But the combination of an oxygen-free clogged pore that’s damp and sticky with sebum and skin cells is the perfect place for the bacteria to thrive.
So you have a gunk-filled pore, then you add more inflammation as your body is trying to fix the clog and BOOM, the whole thing ruptures and leaves you with a big pus-filled zit.
Default text
We all have skin cells, sebum, and bacteria, so why don’t we all have acne?

One possibility is genetics. If your parents had acne, you probably will too. If you’re genetically prone to have extra oily skin and an overproduction of skin cells, you’re likely prone to acne. Thanks, mom and dad.
Default text
settings.advert_headline: The Way You Spend Your Day

settings.advert_text: Believe it or not, your lifestyle habits also affect whether or not you’ll get breakouts. Hormones like androgen, insulin, estrogen, and cortisol control sebum production. When your hormone levels are out of whack, you’re more likely to have too much sebum.

Lifestyle factors like diet, exercise, and stress affect your hormone levels, causing them to produce extra sebum. So when you eat a lot of sugar or dairy, you could be telling your hormones to send oil production into overdrive and leave you with clogged pores.
Default text

If you counteract your skin cell production with gentle exfoliation and balance your hormones with healthy habits and you still can’t kick your breakouts, unrelated medical concerns might be to blame.
Acne is a side effect of several prescription medications. It’s rare for medications to create acne, but they can definitely make it worse.
Some medications, like birth control, alter your hormone levels, and you need balanced hormones to maintain healthy, acne-free skin.

Hormone disorders like PCOS (Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome) also tell sebum production to pick up the pace. As we know, extra sebum is one of the critical ingredients in an acne cocktail. Looking for ways to heal your PCOS-caused acne, we explain it all here.
Default text

It’s one thing to know why you’re getting acne; it’s another thing entirely to change your lifestyle to get rid of it. We get it. Committing to a healthy diet, rigorous skincare routine, or prescription overhaul is daunting.

Your diet and exercise don’t have to be perfect, just find a balance of healthy habits. While you’re working on that, introduce a skincare regimen to help heal, nourish, and protect your skin. Here’s a step by step to treating your acne.
The best part is, you don’t have to do this alone. We have a Facebook group that serves as a community of support and encouragement as you navigate your skincare journey.
Default text
settings.advert_headline: Pregnancy Skin Care: How to Get That Glow

settings.advert_text: “My skin went CRAZY while I was pregnant!”

There’s a lot of expectations that come with pregnancy: a growing belly, luscious hair, a bit of swelling, and the pregnancy glow. It’s so sought after that newly pregnant ladies might find themselves rushing to the mirror following a positive test in search of any change in their appearance.
But as we all know, expectations don’t always match reality.
Thankfully, skincare is an always improving industry and for those newly pregnant mommas, there are safe and effective options for your pregnancy-induced problem skin.
Be sure to consult your healthcare provider before using any products or ingredients while you’re pregnant.
Default text
settings.advert_headline: Do Skin Care Products Really Affect Your Pregnancy?

settings.advert_text: Anything you put onto your skin works its way into your body. When your body is working day and night to grow another human, you have to be overly cautious about what you use to keep it healthy.
There isn’t an exact science to figure out how much of a topical product ends up in your bloodstream.
Doctors have determined the thinner the skin, the more a product will be absorbed.
So it stands to reason, the products you put on your face need to be completely no-risk to the health of your growing babe.
Default text
settings.advert_headline: Skin Care Ingredients to Avoid When Pregnant

settings.advert_text: Not every cosmetic ingredient has been tested for use during pregnancy, but there are some that doctors agree are definite no-nos.

Retinoids: Studies show that a very small amount of retinoids applied topically actually absorb into the skin. While in most cases, retinoid use hasn’t caused problems during pregnancy, there are reports of birth defects that are related to using retinoids. Without further testing, it’s probably best to avoid them.

Whitening creams, like hydroquinone: It might be tempting to apply whitening cream to keep the melasma at bay, but studies have shown that as much as 45% of this product is absorbed into the skin. If you ask us, that’s too much of a foreign chemical in your bloodstream to risk any effects on your baby.

Salicylic acid: A favorite for acne fighters, this ingredient is mostly okay when used topically. It poses a real risk to your unborn baby when you ingest it. But even though it might be technically safe, your skin is so sensitive during pregnancy, it could cause unneeded discomfort. Don’t you already have enough of that?
Tazorac/Accutane: Both these treatments are prescription-only and are proven to cause birth defects. ‘Avoid at all costs’ is an understatement.

Tetracycline: This is an antibiotic acne treatment that has dire consequences for unborn babies. Possible side effects include permanent tooth discoloration, bone growth problems, and malformation of the embryo.

Chemical Sunscreen: We all know that sunscreen is a daily necessity, pregnant or not. This is a product that you want to choose carefully. There is some evidence that suggests chemical sunscreen (with ingredients like, oxybenzone, avobenzone, octisalate, octocrylene, homosalate, or octinoxate) can cause problems to your baby during pregnancy. It’s best to stick with mineral sunscreens that use zinc oxide and titanium dioxide.

Synthetic Fragrance: Some skincare products try to mask the harsh, chemical smell of their ingredients with synthetic fragrances. These are often made with things like parabens, benzene derivatives and other compounds that are linked to cancer. Definitely one to avoid.
Default text
settings.advert_headline: A Pregnancy-Safe Skincare Routine that Actually Works

settings.advert_text: One look at the list above might have all you baby-growing goddesses fleeing as far from acne treatments as possible. Sure, you might have painful acne but nothing is worth risking the life of your baby.
Luckily as our culture steers towards a collective appreciation for all things natural and organic, there are more healthy skincare options for all of us.
As always, you should consult with your healthcare provider before using any products or ingredients during your pregnancy.
At Averr Aglow we prioritize high-quality, natural ingredients. We don’t use any of the harsh chemicals or common irritants listed above.

When you’re pregnant you should be focusing on baby names and nursery designs, not stressing about clear skin. Let us help with your complexion so you can spend your time on the important things. Prenatal massage anyone?

settings.title: OUR STORY
settings.subtitle: TRADITIONAL ROUTES TO CLEAR SKIN WEREN’T WORKING.
settings.heading: So I Made My Own Skincare Solution.
settings.subheading:
Hi, I'm Camille.
I battled with breakouts for 16 years and tried everything to cure them. Healthy diets, creams, and medical prescriptions to no avail.
Nothing helped me, so I decided to create skincare that would.
With natural-based products, I found an answer to my problematic skin, and I want to share it with you.
Five years later since the beginning, Averr Aglow has helped over 100,000 women achieve healthy skin and it can also help you!

settings.subtitle: LET US HELP YOU
settings.title: WHAT’S YOUR SKINCARE ROUTINE?
settings.desc: Choosing skincare doesn’t have to be overwhelming! Take this quiz to discover your personal skincare routine for a healthy, thriving complexion. What are you waiting for?

settings.heading: Leah M.
settings.subheading: A full 3 months of using Averr Aglow. Just wow. Thank you so much Averr Aglow for creating a product that works and has done what no other has ever come close to doing! A 15 year struggle, Accutane, thousands of products and dollars no more. Seriously, thank you so much.

settings.heading: Jenna M.
settings.subheading: Been using Averr Aglow for about 8 months and obsessed..I love this skincare system ... before I was getting hormonal acne every month that would be huge, cystic and take forever to disappear (I had more acne now at 38 than in HS!!!- uggghhh) Thank you Averr Aglow for a great skincare system! Pic was taken today.

settings.heading: Liz G.
settings.subheading:
Let me start by saying I am way outside of my comfort zone posting these pics and I never planned to do a before/after post, but Averr Aglow has helped me so much I can’t NOT share. 

So I am 42 years old and I have struggled with acne my entire adult life. I’ve been on accurate three times (yup, thrice times), I’ve used countless over the counter acne cleansers, retinol creams blah blah blah. Some worked but either my acne came back or the chemicals were just too harsh on my sensitive skin. I began using AA in February of 2020 and it has been a life changer. The picture on the left is just this morning and the pic on the right was right before I started using AA. No filters, no make up, just a fresh morning face. My skin is more even and I can’t recall when I last had a pimple. I love Averr Aglow products and I look forward to using their new line they just released.

settings.heading: Jen M.
settings.subheading: Just wanted to share my results. Picture on the left was February 22nd, June 4 on the right. I’m wearing absolutely zero makeup on my actual face...just mascara. This is a first in my adult life. I started with the Clear Skin kit and have added in the serum, toner and the exfoliating mask. Stick with it, it works!!!

settings.heading: Veronika B.
settings.subheading: I’m 2 1/2 weeks into AA. I bought the full kit and have been using it religiously. I’m super happy with my skin so far!!! I feel like there is a huge difference in overall tone and texture. I have a few red spots/scars that are still healing, but my skin heals so much faster with AA. (Both pics are without makeup).

settings.heading: Mikala W.
settings.subheading:
Just wanted to post some progress pics for anyone who needs some encouragement!! I’m going into my 7th month using Averr Aglow, and the pics speak for themselves! I started getting acne around age 15-16, and like everyone, tried everything! Birth control, creams, dermatologists, aestheticians, and Accutane. Nothing worked for about 6 years. 

I’m getting married in December, and I knew that I wanted to have clearer skin before the big day, so I committed to using AA, and I am so glad I did!! Totally worth the money. I use pretty much all the products- everything in the luminous clear skin kit, plus the serum, and I just bought exfoliating mask. *i have no face makeup on in these after pics!

settings.sbText: Shake the #1 Opulent Hydration Dew before misting your face 8-10 times, until damp.

Shake #2 Refining Cleansing Nectar until colors are combined. Saturate a cotton pad with 3-4 circles of Nectar. Using firm pressure buff onto your face and neck. Repeat with the opposite side of cotton pad. No rinse needed!

Tap the bottom of #3 Invigorating Renewing Elixir in the palm of your hand to settle the bubbles. Press 1-2 pumps of the Elixir into your hand and massage across your face. Let dry for 10 minutes before bed and wear overnight.

Apply moisturizer to your face, neck, and décolleté, gently massaging in an outward and upward direction. Breathe in the intoxicating scent of blue tansy to start your peaceful morning or drift off into a night of tranquil bliss.

Use spatula to scoop out a grain-sized amount of the Ageless Eyes Day Cream in the morning or the Satin Eyes Night Mask at night. Dab three dots of cream on the orbital bone (bone under your eye). Rub gently into skin and avoid using any other products on this area of your face.

settings.ssText: Whether in the morning or the night, we want your radiant skin goals realized. That is why we have these amazing steps to ensure your success. We can't wait to see your results.

settings.heading: Liz G.
settings.subheading:
Let me start by saying I am way outside of my comfort zone posting these pics and I never planned to do a before/after post, but Averr Aglow has helped me so much I can’t NOT share. 

So I am 42 years old and I have struggled with acne my entire adult life. I’ve been on accurate three times (yup, thrice times), I’ve used countless over the counter acne cleansers, retinol creams blah blah blah. Some worked but either my acne came back or the chemicals were just too harsh on my sensitive skin. I began using AA in February of 2020 and it has been a life changer. The picture on the left is just this morning and the pic on the right was right before I started using AA. No filters, no make up, just a fresh morning face. My skin is more even and I can’t recall when I last had a pimple. I love Averr Aglow products and I look forward to using their new line they just released. Also, I really do have sensitive skin and not only have these products helped with my acne, but they are all so calming!!! Thank you Averr Aglow!!
